rules_text:
Your opponents can't gain life.
If a source you control would deal damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.
{3}{R}: Transform Pyromantic Duo. Activate only if it's attacking.
rules_text2:
Your opponents can't gain life.
If a source you control would deal damage to an opponent, it deals twice that much damage instead.
At the beginning of your end step, if Mayhem Tandem didn't attack this turn, transform it.
